# Nature (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |

| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Power:** Rebuke or command normal animals or plant creatures as an evil cleric rebukes or commands undead. Use this ability a total number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

**Nature Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Trance (Spell)|Trance]]****:** Meditate to learn about nearby spirits.

**2** **[[Commune with Lesser Spirit (Spell)|Commune with Lesser Spirit]]****:** Lesser spirit answers one question/2 levels.

**3 Possess Animal:** Your soul inhabits and controls an animalâ€™s body.

**4** **[[Elemental Ward (Spell)|Elemental Ward]]****:** Drive elementals away.

**5** **[[Commune with Greater Spirit (Spell)|Commune with Greater Spirit]]****:** Ask any spirit 1 question/level.

**6** **[[Transport via Plants (Spell)|Transport via Plants]]****:** Move instantly from one plant to another of the same species.

**7** **[[Control Weather (Spell)|Control Weather]]****:** Changes weather in local area.

**8** **[[Animal Shapes (Spell)|Animal Shapes]]****:** One ally/level polymorphs into chosen animal.

**9** **[[Shapechange (Spell)|Shapechange]]****:** Transforms you into any creature, and change forms once per round.

**Source:** Oriental Adventures (WotC), pg. 88
